titles.title: Wooser no Sono Higurashi Mugen Hen
Project Wooser 3
うーさーのその日暮らし 夢幻編
Wooser`s Hand-to-Mouth Life: Phantasmagoric Arc
兔宝的悲惨日常 梦幻篇

relatedanime.anime: Wooser no Sono Higurashi Kakusei Hen

anime.description: The zany and cute-but-crude Wooser returns for another season in Wooser`s Hand-to-Mouth Life: Phantasmagoric Arc! Voiced by the prolific and hugely popular voice actor Mamoru Miyano, Wooser is a creature that only cares about three things in life: meat, money, and girls. Source: crunchyroll

externalentity.identifier: うーさーのその日暮らし

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: manga
tag.description: Manga is the lifeblood that drives the anime industry. Everything and its mother is based on manga. However! There are exceptions where the manga was not the basis for the anime. It`s common practice to make manga adaptations of many popular anime, there`s a manga based on Evangelion, and two (one shounen and one shoujo) based on each of Escaflowne and Mahou Tsukai Tai. Also it`s quite common to release manga and anime versions of a story in parallel, for instance Nadesico and Shoujo Kakumei Utena. There are also cases where an anime continues in a manga, as in the case of Angel Beats! and Angel Beats: Heaven`s Door, or reverse. See also http://anidb.net/t6493 [manhua] and http://anidb.net/t5010 [manhwa].

tag.name: DESCRIPTION MISSING
tag.description: The description for this entry is missing. e.g plot, biography... Please help by adding it, and remove this tag afterwards. Thank you.

tag.name: short episodes
tag.description: Short episodes are regular episodes that are much shorter than the standard length. This means up to and including 10 minutes; shows with episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length are http://anidb.net/t6494 [half-length episodes] instead. Not to be confused with http://anidb.net/t6349 [multi-segment episodes], which are regular episodes that are split into several short segments (parts), usually with separate titles and independent storylines.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: multi-anime projects
tag.description: Many anime are created as part of larger projects encompassing many shows without direct relation to one another. Normally, there is a specific idea in mind: for example, the http://anidb.net/t4859 [Young Animator Training Project] aims to stimulate the on-the-job training of next-generation professionals of the anime industry, whereas the http://anidb.net/t3763 [World Masterpiece Theatre] aims to animate classical stories from all over the world.

tag.name: Ultra Super Anime Time
tag.description: Ultra Super Anime Time was a half-hour anime block produced by http://anidb.net/cr30397 [Ultra Super Pictures] that aired on Tokyo MX and BS11 between July 2015 and June 2016. The block typically featured three http://anidb.net/t5852 [short episodes] anime of about eight minutes each.

character.name: Namae o Yonde wa Ikenai Ano Doubutsu
Iona
character.description: I-401`s mental model. Why she`s allying with the humans is a mystery.

character.name: Haruna
character.description: The Mental Model of the Kongou-class battlecruiser Haruna.

episode.title: うーさー教授曰く, すべてはJ/Kになる
Professor Wooser Says, "Everything Becomes J/K"
Wooser-kyouju Iwaku, Subete wa J/K ni Naru
episode.summary: You can never remember what exactly goes on in an episode of Wooser, can you? But did you know this is actually the 88,888th broadcast of this episode? Is everything a dream? Can Wooser overcome Nietzsche`s Eternal Recurrence, and defeat Diogenes in his attempt to live an austere life? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: うーさー先生, 締め切りとの戦い
Wooser-sensei`s Battle with Deadlines
Wooser-sensei, Shimekiri to no Tatakai
episode.summary: It hurts... it hurts so much... Wooser is in great pain staring at a blank white sheet of paper. His deadline is coming but he`s too hung over to think of anything. He wasn`t just being lazy, though, he was drinking all night with the sponsers to keep from running out of money. WIll Wooser be able to overcome the evil within himself and meet his deadline? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 策士うーさー, その卑劣なる謀略
Wooser the Strategist and His Cunning Plan
Sakushi Wooser, Sono Hiretsu Naru Bouryaku
episode.summary: Yesterday, tomorrow, and likely for the rest of time, Wooser just sits and consumes instead of working. Darth Wooser almost calls him a NEET, but is stopped by the self-destruct circuits that will destroy him if he insults his master. To make things worse, Wooser actively tries to get him to self-destruct. What will be the fate of Darth Wooser? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: wooser`s hand to mouth life is back again
Wooser`s Hand to Mouth Life Is Back Again
Wooser`s Hand to Mouth Life Is Back Again
episode.summary: This is the tale of an unknown hero. Once day, Wooser leaves for deep space, risking his life to protect the things he loves. ... Probably the things he loves are money, meat, and girls. Also uniforms. But there are those who love him anyway: Rin, and Ren. When the wish they made on a starry sky is heard, a miracle will occur in a distant galaxy! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白昼夢うーさーの変身ふたたび
Daydreaming Wooser Transforms Once More
Hakuchuumu Wooser no Henshin Futatabi
episode.summary: Wooser is turned into a grasshopper and smashes up the city again. Rin and Len must transform into magical girls to stop him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 村人うーさー, その獣の本性
The Villager Wooser and His True Bestial Nature
Murabito Wooser, Sono Kemono no Honshou
episode.summary: Wooser plays a game where one player is the werewolf, and the others are villagers trying to find him. The game is popular with middle school and high school girls, which is why Wooser likes it. He`s a villager, so will he be able to find the wolf in time? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: うーさー監督, 黄昏の映画狂時代
Director Wooser and the Twilight Age of Movie Madness
Wooser-kantoku, Tasogare no Eiga-kyou Jidai
episode.summary: To fund his elegant lifestyle of never leaving the house, Wooser decides to enter a one million yen movie contest. But he knows nothing about making movies, and has nothing but crazy ideas. Just when the project is about to fall apart, a certain famous movie actress agrees to help. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: うーさ53. 私アイドルになります
Wooser53, I`m Going to Be an Idol
Wooser 53, Watashi Idol ni Narimasu
episode.summary: If having two people makes the work go twice as fast, having fifty three people will make it go fifty three times as fast! Wooser splits himself into 53 Woosers and forms an idol group, Wooser53. With Miss Monochrome`s help, they go big. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ハンターうーさー, 祭りの掟
Hunter Wooser and the Law of the Festival
Hunter Wooser, Matsuri no Okite
episode.summary: Wooser loves his uniforms, and he loves his uniform doujinshi. He loves them so much that he`ll brave the sweltering heat, freezing cold, and massive crowds to get them. But there is one final test he must past... the mysterious masked swordsman! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 青い海白い砂浜, 黒いうーさー
Blue Seas, White Sand, Black Wooser
Aoi Umi Shiroi Sunahama, Kuroi Wooser
episode.summary: Wooser and the gang are trapped in coffins on a beach next to a sea of blood. They seem oblivious to this. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: うーさーの優しい世界
Wooser`s Kind World
Wooser no Yasashii Sekai
episode.summary: Wooser becomes omnipotent. His powers know no bounds, changing the weather, changing even the laws of nature and finally even consuming the world. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 名探偵うーさー, 最後の事件
Detective Wooser`s Final Problem
Meitantei Wooser, Saigo no Jiken
episode.summary: Detective Wooser solves the crime of the century. Ajipon has been murdered, and it`s up to Wooser to find the killer. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: wooser`s hand to mouth life a dream play...
Wooser`s Hand to Mouth Life a Dream Play...
Wooser`s Hand to Mouth Life a Dream Play...
episode.summary: With a piece of ice hidden in a snowball, a snow fight turns murderous. Source: crunchyroll
